comments.comments_text: A corner kick by Paris SG is thwarted by the well prepared Jonas Omlin (Montpellier).
comments.comments_text_anonymized: A corner kick by [TEAM] is thwarted by the well prepared [PLAYER] ([TEAM]).

comments.comments_text: Jonas Omlin comes off his line to intercept the corner from Lionel Messi (Paris SG).
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] comes off his line to intercept the corner from [PLAYER] ([TEAM]).

comments.comments_text: Lionel Messi (Paris SG) takes the corner but fails to find any of his teammates. The ball is easily cleared out of danger.

comments.comments_text: Kylian Mbappe (Paris SG) is going to take the penalty!

comments.comments_text: Lionel Messi (Paris SG) sends the corner into the box, but Jonas Omlin intercepts it and averts the threat.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) sends the corner into the box, but [PLAYER] intercepts it and averts the threat.

comments.comments_text: Lionel Messi (Paris SG) sends a direct shot in from the free kick that's in a promising position. The ball sails towards the right post, but the goalkeeper prevents a goal with a quick save. The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. Paris SG will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.

comments.comments_text: Paris SG take a short corner instead of sending the ball into the penalty area.

comments.comments_text: Nothing comes of the resulting corner from Neymar (Paris SG). The defence is alert and manages to cut it out.

comments.comments_text: What bad luck! Falaye Sacko (Montpellier) sends the ball into his own net.

comments.comments_text: Nuno Mendes (Paris SG) attempts to find one of his teammates with a sweet pass into the box, but one of the defending players reacts well and intercepts the effort. Paris SG have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.

comments.comments_text: Neymar (Paris SG) gets to the rebound inside the six-yard box and produces a header. He manages to put the ball inside the right post and makes it 3:0.
